results.definition: tilling the land with a plow
examples: he hired someone to do the plowing for him

results.definition: to break and turn over earth especially with a plow
examples: Farmer Jones plowed his east field last week
turn the earth in the Spring

results.definition: act on verbally or in some form of artistic expression
examples: The course covered all of Western Civilization
The new book treats the history of China

results.definition: move in a way resembling that of a plow cutting into or going through the soil
examples: The ship plowed through the water
